mapper.insert:
insert into tunnel_info
tunnel_info.create_time,
tunnel_info.direction,
tunnel_info.end_miles,
tunnel_info.input_code,
tunnel_info.is_delete,

tunnel_info.remark,
tunnel_info.side,
tunnel_info.start_miles,
tunnel_info.status,
tunnel_info.track_distance,
tunnel_info.track_division_id,
tunnel_info.tunne_name,
tunnel_info.tunne_no,
tunnel_info.update_time,
values
#{createTime},
#{direction},

#{inputCode},

mapper.update:
update tunnel_info
tunnel_info.create_time = #{createTime},
tunnel_info.direction = #{direction},
tunnel_info.end_miles = #{endMiles},
tunnel_info.input_code = #{inputCode},
tunnel_info.is_delete = #{isDelete},
tunnel_info.length = #{length},
tunnel_info.line_id = #{lineId},
tunnel_info.long_chain = #{longChain},
tunnel_info.middle_miles = #{middleMiles},
tunnel_info.operator = #{operator},
tunnel_info.remark = #{remark},
tunnel_info.side = #{side},
tunnel_info.start_miles = #{startMiles},
tunnel_info.status = #{status},
tunnel_info.track_distance = #{trackDistance},
tunnel_info.track_division_id = #{trackDivisionId},
tunnel_info.tunne_name = #{tunneName},
tunnel_info.tunne_no = #{tunneNo},
tunnel_info.update_time = #{updateTime}
where tunnel_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select tunnel_info.create_time, tunnel_info.direction, tunnel_info.end_miles, tunnel_info.id, tunnel_info.input_code, tunnel_info.is_delete, tunnel_info.length, tunnel_info.line_id, tunnel_info.long_chain, tunnel_info.middle_miles, tunnel_info.operator, tunnel_info.remark, tunnel_info.side, tunnel_info.start_miles, tunnel_info.status, tunnel_info.track_distance, tunnel_info.track_division_id, tunnel_info.tunne_name, tunnel_info.tunne_no, tunnel_info.update_time form tunnel_info where tunnel_info.id = #{id}
